summary: This mod replaces the music that plays when you launch Skyrim. I wanted music that was epic, but also started up quickly. No one is going to wait around in the main menu screen while the music builds up. This track brings the epic fast.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/dR7qP.png[/img]

[center]A main menu music replacer mod by Hothtrooper44.[/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/l0NT8.png[/img]
This mod replaces the music that plays when you launch Skyrim. I wanted music that was epic, but also started up quickly. No one is going to wait around in the main menu screen while the music builds up. This track brings the epic fast.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/vPLtkYI.png[/img][youtube]KJ3yrVRovps[/youtube][img]http://i.imgur.com/qHaYxq3.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1HE2h.png[/img]
Track edited, converted, and implimented by Hothtrooper44
Music used: Battle of Kings by Machinimasound.com
Screenshot by Chilliblitz

[img]http://i.imgur.com/i3r2e.png[/img]
